title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Skills: Cohort-Based Expert Development for Active Learning Strategy Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can appropriately apply three or more active learning strategies in science classes
Learners collaboratively develop and execute at least one active learning design plan with cohort members
Learners analyze changes in instructional effectiveness before and after implementing active learning through self-assessment and peer evaluation
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
